He said: I worry about it- because of my age. When I was a youngster, my dad used to play soccer and games with me. And I worry that if I was 70. "Also, if children could be born at the age of five I'd quite like that. I like them at that age when they can talk and understand. I'm not sure I could deal with the whole "ga ga goo" thing. But I genuinely like kids. Simon Cowell also admitted Mezhgan, 36, has "softened" him and has finally made him think about settling down forever. Despite his reputation for brutal honesty and cold-heartedness, the Los Angeles-based showbiz mogul stressed the importance of emotion in the entertainment business. You've got to think with your heart and not your head, he said. "The biggest failures I've had were at a time when I believed my own hype." bills on abortion funding this week, Senate Democrats on Tuesday took aim at the GOP proposals as "extreme" and charged that they are a distraction from Congress's top priority of kick-starting the economy. We're here today to send a clear message to our Republican colleagues on the House Judiciary Committee side: Your agenda on women's health is extreme. It breaks faith with a decades-long bipartisan compromise. And according to medical experts, your agenda risks the health and the lives of women, Barbara Boxer ( D-Calif.) said at a Capitol news conference. For them, the Hoosier checks many boxes- a fresh face on the national scene, a charismatic speaker from the heartland and, most important, a Republican who can appeal to all three elements of the party base: social conservatives, economic conservatives and foreign policy conservatives, the story said. to have plenty of laughs at Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell 's expense but now they've been replaced with Michael McIntyre and David Hasselhoff . Ant McPartlin admitted BGT had changed without those two big egos to prick. He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better. "Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan . You miss Simon Cowell because he is the best judge. He has that ability to say what you at home are thinking. Declan Donnelly added: "For me, it's just great to be able to introduce the guy from Knight Rider every day... to a backing track of the Knight Rider theme tune."
